title: How do I add a contact to a contact group?
answer: Choose either of the following methods: [Select a group from Group name. ]() ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110517) Touch Contacts > Favorites. Select a group and touch Add members. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110518) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110519)
